card.name: Ms. Marvel
card.property: Rechannel — Action: Spend a [energy] resource and heal 1 damage from Ms. Marvel → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.) “Always get up. If you always get up, then it's never over.”

alternate.name: Carol Danvers
alternate.property: Commander — Action: Choose a player to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.) “I'm kind of done with you telling me what I can't do.”

card.name: Spider-Woman (jessica drew)
card.property: Response: After Spider-Woman enters play, confuse an enemy. If you paid for this card with only [energy] resources, stun that enemy. “This is what I wanted: helping the innocent by hospitalizing the guilty.”

card.name: Crisis Interdiction
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you overpaid for this card with a [energy] resource, remove 3 threat from a scheme. "If we could, let's skip the whole - ambush me and make me fight for my life thing."

card.name: Crisis Interdiction
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you overpaid for this card with a [energy] resource, remove 3 threat from a scheme. "If we could, let's skip the whole - ambush me and make me fight for my life thing."

card.name: Photonic Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, draw 1 card. "I sort of accidentally blasted him in the crotch. Seven times in the crotch. Poor guy turned blue."

card.name: Photonic Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, draw 1 card. "I sort of accidentally blasted him in the crotch. Seven times in the crotch. Poor guy turned blue."

card.name: Cosmic Overload
card.property: You can only spend [energy] resources to pay for this card. Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy for each [energy] resource used to pay for this card. This attack gains piercing and overkill.

card.name: Cosmic Overload
card.property: You can only spend [energy] resources to pay for this card. Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy for each [energy] resource used to pay for this card. This attack gains piercing and overkill.

card.name: Marvelous Might
card.property:
Hero Action (thwart): Remove a total of 3 threat from among schemes in play. If this removes the last threat from a scheme, stun or confuse the villain.
"All right, you gigantic Skrull &%$#. Time for you to die."

card.name: Simon Williams
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Simon Williams → return the bottommost card with a printed [energy] resource from your discard pile to your hand. “Uh...if you can get us any help - GET IT!” —Wonder Man

card.name: Ms. Marvel's Suit
card.property: You get +4 hit points. Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, exhaust Ms. Marvel's Suit and spend an [energy] resource → prevent 2 of that damage. “needs quote here!” —Ms. Marvel

card.name: Cosmic Might
card.property: Ms. Marvel gets +1 ATK. Hero Resource: Exhaust Cosmic Might → generate a [energy] resource for an identity-specific event.

card.name: Kree Durability
card.property: Ms. Marvel gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you defeat an enemy or remove the last threat from a scheme, exhaust Kree Durability → ready Ms. Marvel.

card.name: Seventh Sense
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you reveal a card from the encounter deck, cancel the effects of that card and discard it. "I'm not going to run away from anything...ever again."

card.name: Identity Crisis
card.property: You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: Exhaust Carol Danvers → remove Identity Crisis from the game. Discard 1 [[persona]] support you control. If no support was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Rogue Rivalry
card.property: Ms. Marvel has been targeted by Mystique. Acting impulsively, Rogue has decided to take matters into her own hands. Forced Response: After the villain phase begins, each player discards a random card from their hand. [crisis]

card.name: Rogue
card.property: Guard. Teamwork ([[brotherhood of mutants]]). Toughness. [star] Forced Response: After Rogue attacks you, discard a [energy] resource from your hand, if able. (Ms. Marvel’s nemesis minion.)

card.name: Mystique
card.property: Patrol. Teamwork ([[brotherhood of mutants]]). When Defeated: Choose to either spend a [mental] resource or confuse your identity. [star] Boost: You are confused.

card.name: Rogue Assault
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place threat on the main scheme equal to the total number of [energy] resources in your hand. When Revealed (Hero): Take indirect damage equal to the total number of [energy] resources in your hand.

card.name: Veiled Ambush
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain schemes. Place 1 threat on each side scheme. When Revealed (Hero): The villain attacks you. Place 1 threat on each side scheme.
